sect2.title: Controls
sect2.para: FIXME: Clear, consistent and concise labelling of controls is essential. It helps users work out the purpose of a window they've never seen before, quickly find the information they want, and navigate around it easily.

To a visually-impaired user, the labels you write are even more important. A user relying on a screenreader will have no assistance from icons, layout, or spacing to work out what your controls do, so clear labelling is vital.

sect1.title: Warning and Error Messages
sect1.para: FIXME: Tell the user what the problem is, what they can do about it, and, if possible, offer to do it for them.
